mapper.insert: insert into promises(promise_title, promise_leader, promise_date, promise_time, promise_day, promise_vote_is_finish, promise_schedule_is_finish) values(#{promiseTitle}, #{promiseLeader}, #{promiseDate}, #{promiseTime}, #{promiseDay}, #{promiseVoteIsFinish}, #{promiseScheduleIsFinish})
mapper.select: select p.promise_seq, promise_title, promise_leader, promise_date, promise_time, promise_day, promise_vote_is_finish, promise_schedule_is_finish from promises p join promises_members m on p.promise_seq = m.promise_seq where m.member_seq = #{memberSeq}
mapper.update: update promises set `promise_vote_is_finish` = if(`promise_vote_is_finish` = 1, 0 , 1) where promise_seq = #{promiseSeq}
update promises set `promise_schedule_is_finish` = if(`promise_schedule_is_finish` = 1, 0 , 1) where promise_seq = #{promiseSeq}
